pullrequest.title: I think we are done supporting ign-transport2?

content.raw: Ign-transport 2 is the highest ign-transport version [searched](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/2c4ce8c3a38acaa6c214a0943e2cd28f6635a3a5/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake?at=gazebo7&fileviewer=file-view-default#SearchForStuff.cmake-673) by Gazebo 7. Gazebo 7 doesn't seem to use it at all though, so I don't know why it is looking for it. Maybe there are downstream packages using it?
content.html: Ign-transport 2 is the highest ign-transport version searched by Gazebo 7. Gazebo 7 doesn't seem to use it at all though, so I don't know why it is looking for it. Maybe there are downstream packages using it?
